name: frankys-plugins
description: Shamiaza's collection of Claude Code plugins for React, Flutter, and NestJS development

plugins.name: react-dev
plugins.description: React development agents and workflows for building TypeScript React applications with functional programming patterns

plugins.name: flutter-dev
plugins.description: Flutter development agents and workflows for building multi-tenant applications with Clean Architecture

plugins.name: nestjs-dev
plugins.description: NestJS backend development agents and workflows for building enterprise-grade REST APIs

plugins.name: context-management
plugins.description: Context gathering, documentation, and knowledge management agents for comprehensive codebase analysis

plugins.name: orchestrator-mode
plugins.description: Enforces orchestrator pattern by warning when main context attempts direct file edits

plugins.name: rule-creator
plugins.description: Agent and command for creating and managing Claude rules files in .claude/rules/ with path-scoping and modular organization

plugins.name: project-memory
plugins.description: Complete project memory management: modular organization, session notes, architecture sync, and periodic review
